name: python-enhancements
description: Python-specific analysis enhancements for file summaries
additionalInstructions: Identify ALL decorators (@app.route, @router.post, @property, @staticmethod, @classmethod, @validator, etc.) with their line numbers
For Pydantic BaseModel subclasses, list all fields with their types and validators
Note async functions (async def) and where they use await
If __all__ is present, list all exported symbols exactly as defined
Identify context managers (with statements) and what resources they manage
Note type hints (typing.Optional, typing.List, etc.) and their usage
For FastAPI routes, document: HTTP method, path, request/response models, dependencies
For Django models, list: fields, relationships (ForeignKey, ManyToMany), Meta class options
For Flask routes, note: URL patterns, methods, before_request/after_request hooks
Identify dataclasses and their fields (@dataclass decorator)
